166 class NCPP_DEFAULT_ALIGNAS win_thread {
167
171
172 public:
173 friend win_thread& main_thread();
174
178
179#pragma region Typedefs
180 public:
181 using functor_type = std::function<void()>;
182#pragma endregion
183
187
188#pragma region Nested Types
189 private:
190 struct main_thread_creation_placeholder {};
191#pragma endregion
192
196
197#pragma region Properties
198 private:
202 HANDLE __platform__thread_;
206 DWORD __platform__id_;
210 functor_type functor_;
211 sz stack_size_;
212 std::atomic_bool is_ready_;
213 bool is_main_;
214
215#ifdef NCPP_ENABLE_FIBER
216 fiber owned_fiber_;
217#endif
218#pragma endregion
219
223
224#pragma region Getters and Setters
225 public:
226 inline LPVOID __platform__thread() const { return __platform__thread_; }
227 inline DWORD __platform__id() const { return __platform__id_; }
228 inline u32 id() const { return __platform__id_; }
229 inline const functor_type& functor() const { return functor_; }
230 inline bool is_done() const {
231
232 DWORD ex_code;
233
234 bool r = GetExitCodeThread(
235 __platform__thread_,
236 &ex_code
237 );
238
239 return (!r) || (ex_code != STILL_ACTIVE);
240 }
241 inline bool is_main() { return is_main_; }
242
243 inline fiber& owned_fiber() { return owned_fiber_; }
244#pragma endregion
245
249
250#pragma region Constructors, Destrutor and Operators
251 private:
255 inline win_thread::win_thread(main_thread_creation_placeholder) :
256 __platform__thread_(GetCurrentThread()),
257 __platform__id_(GetCurrentThreadId()),
258 stack_size_(0),
259 is_ready_(1),
260
261#ifdef NCPP_ENABLE_FIBER
262 owned_fiber_(fiber_creation_mode::CONVERT_FROM_THREAD),
263#endif
264
265 is_main_(1)
266 {
267
268 sz sl_low = 0;
269 sz sl_high = 0;
270 GetCurrentThreadStackLimits(&sl_low, &sl_high);
271
272 stack_size_ = sl_high - sl_low;
273
274 }
275
276 static win_thread main_thread_g;
277
281
282 public:
287 inline win_thread::win_thread() :
288 __platform__thread_(0),
289 __platform__id_(0),
290 stack_size_(NCPP_DEFAULT_THREAD_STACK_SIZE),
291
292#ifdef NCPP_ENABLE_FIBER
293 owned_fiber_(),
294#endif
295
296 is_main_(0)
297 {
298
299
300
301 }
305 inline win_thread::win_thread(functor_type&& functor, sz stack_size = NCPP_DEFAULT_THREAD_STACK_SIZE) :
306 __platform__thread_(0),
307 __platform__id_(0),
308 is_ready_(0),
309 stack_size_(stack_size),
310 functor_(std::move(functor)),
311
312#ifdef NCPP_ENABLE_FIBER
313 owned_fiber_(fiber_creation_mode::CONVERT_FROM_THREAD_DI),
314#endif
315
316 is_main_(0)
317 {
318
319 __platform__thread_ = CreateThread(
320 0,
321 stack_size,
322 proc,
323 this,
324 STACK_SIZE_PARAM_IS_A_RESERVATION,
325 &__platform__id_
326 );
327
328 assert(__platform__thread_ != 0 && "thread creating failed");
329
330 while (!is_ready_.load(std::memory_order_acquire));
331
332 }
336 win_thread::~win_thread() {
337
338 if (__platform__thread_ == 0) return;
339
340 if (!is_main_) {
341
342 assert(is_done() && "Cant release currently running thread");
343
344 CloseHandle(__platform__thread_);
345
346 }
347
348 }
349
350 inline win_thread(const win_thread&) = delete;
351 inline win_thread& operator = (const win_thread&) = delete;
352
356 inline win_thread(win_thread&& other) noexcept :
357 win_thread()
358 {
359
360 while (!other.is_ready_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed));
361 std::atomic_thread_fence(std::memory_order_acquire);
362
363 __platform__thread_ = other.__platform__thread_;
364 __platform__id_ = other.__platform__id_;
365 stack_size_ = other.stack_size_;
366 is_main_ = other.is_main_;
367 functor_ = std::move(other.functor_);
368
369#ifdef NCPP_ENABLE_FIBER
370 owned_fiber_ = std::move(other.owned_fiber_);
371#endif
372
373 other.__platform__thread_ = 0;
374 other.__platform__id_ = 0;
375 other.stack_size_ = 0;
376 other.is_main_ = 0;
377
378 }
379
383 inline win_thread& operator = (win_thread&& other) noexcept {
384
385 while (!other.is_ready_.load(std::memory_order_relaxed));
386 std::atomic_thread_fence(std::memory_order_acquire);
387
388 __platform__thread_ = other.__platform__thread_;
389 __platform__id_ = other.__platform__id_;
390 stack_size_ = other.stack_size_;
391 is_main_ = other.is_main_;
392 functor_ = std::move(other.functor_);
393
394#ifdef NCPP_ENABLE_FIBER
395 owned_fiber_ = std::move(other.owned_fiber_);
396#endif
397
398 other.__platform__thread_ = 0;
399 other.__platform__id_ = 0;
400 other.stack_size_ = 0;
401 other.is_main_ = 0;
402
403 return *this;
404 }
405#pragma endregion
406
410
411#pragma region Methods
412 public:
416 static DWORD WINAPI proc(LPVOID lpParam);
417
422 inline void sleep_and_wait() {
423
424 assert(__platform__thread_ != 0 && "thread is null");
425
426 WaitForSingleObject(__platform__thread_, 0);
427
428 }
432 inline void wait() {
433
434 assert(__platform__thread_ != 0 && "thread is null");
435
436 while (!is_done());
437
438 }
439
443 inline u64 set_affinity_mask(u64 mask) {
444
445 assert(__platform__thread_ != 0 && "thread is null");
446
447 return SetThreadAffinityMask(__platform__thread_, mask);
448 }
449#pragma endregion
450
451 };
452
453 }
